description_zh: 帮助独立开发者获得初始用户，外链质量也不错，可以投稿独立开发故事、产品。
description_en: Help independent developers acquire initial users. The quality of external links is also good. You can submit independent development stories and products.
rating_zh: 独立开发前线是独立开发指南网站，内容包含独立开发创意发现，产品实现，获取增长，流量变现等方面，旨在帮助独立开发者更快的成长，打造属于自己的盈利产品。
rating_en: Independent Development Frontline is a website dedicated to providing guidance for independent developers. Its content covers various aspects such as idea discovery, product implementation, growth acquisition, and traffic monetization in independent development. The aim is to assist independent developers in growing more rapidly and creating their own profitable products.
